summary: AT ABOUT 65,000 MILES, THE ENGINE HAS BEEN BURNING 1/2 QUART OF OIL EVERY 200-300 MILES.  NOT LEAKING ONTO THE GROUND AND DO NOT SEE IN THE EXHAUST.  ANTI-LOCK BRAKE SYSTEM (ABS) LIGHT COMES ON AND OFF WHEN GOING OVER BUMPS.  THE ABS SENSOR CONNECTION ON THE REAR AXLE IS ALWAYS LOOSE.  GAS GAUGE NOT READING PROPER LEVEL.  HAVE BEEN THROUGH 5  IN-DASH CD CHANGERS.     *TT
